content.title: Kommerell Diverticulum
content.description: Aortic diverticulum at origin of aberrant subclavian artery

key_concepts.details: Remnant of embryonic aortic arch; outpouching at origin of aberrant subclavian artery
Seen with aberrant right subclavian artery (ARSA) or aberrant left subclavian with right arch
May cause dysphagia lusoria; can dilate and rupture
Consider repair if >3 cm diameter or symptomatic; open or hybrid approaches

content.clinical_significance: Aneurysmal degeneration risk increases with diverticulum size

primary_sources: Cin√† CS et al. J Vasc Surg 2004
